==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Ullanta is a messenger from the Scions of the Canopy who relays messages during ''The Surging Darkness''. Although unconfirmed, he possibly dies during the same quest if "Echoes Through the Valley" is not chosen in Diverging Point #2 during the quest.
